title: Jennifer Lawrence speaks out on Hollywood wage gap
text: Jennifer Lawrence speaks out on Hollywood wage gap Tuesday, 13 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) The actress wrote an essay called "Why Do I Make Less Than My Male Co‑Stars?" Jennifer Lawrence y algunos de sus otros co-estrellas de Hunger Games creen que elegir a Doland Trump como Presidente marcaría 'el fin del mundo.' Recent related news Jennifer Lawrence expresses anger at Hollywood's gender pay gap ‘I’m over trying to find the adorable way to state my opinion,’ the Oscar winner says of her disappointment at finding she was paid less than her male...
